content.raw:
We have another test that seg-faults after writing the junit file, and I didn't notice it in the test results. INTEGRATION_concave_mesh started seg-faulting after
[gazebo pull request 1066](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1066/share-vertices-when-loading-a-collada-mesh/diff). Note that it is [not listed in the list of failing tests](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/717/testReport/), but it is shown as seg-faulting in the
[console output](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/717/consoleFull):
~~~
145: [----------] 9 tests from PhysicsEngines/ConcaveMeshTest (36369 ms total)
145: 
145: [----------] Global test environment tear-down
145: [==========] 9 tests from 1 test case ran. (36369 ms total)
145: [  PASSED  ] 9 tests.
145: [0m
  5/108 Test #145: INTEGRATION_concave_mesh .....................***Exception: SegFault 58.20 sec
test 146
        Start 146: check_INTEGRATION_concave_mesh

146: Test command: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/tools/check_test_ran.py "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test_results/INTEGRATION_concave_mesh.xml"
146: Test timeout computed to be: 9.99988e+06
146: Checking for test results in /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-nvidia/build/test_results/INTEGRATION_concave_mesh.xml
  6/108 Test #146: check_INTEGRATION_concave_mesh ...............   Passed    0.02 sec

~~~
content.html:
We have another test that seg-faults after writing the junit file, and I didn't notice it in the test results. INTEGRATION_concave_mesh started seg-faulting after gazebo pull request 1066. Note that it is not listed in the list of failing tests, but it is shown as seg-faulting in the console output:
